author: Niklas Gollenstede
description: Disables / modifies some browser APIs that would otherwise allow browser fingerprinting
name: stop-fingerprinting

preferences.name: excludeList
preferences.title: Exclude list
preferences.value:
# List one exclude domain, url-prefix or RegExp per line.
# Domains and url-prefixes will be prepended with 'https?://' if omitted,
# only '*' (arbitrary number of arbitrary  characters) as wildcard allowed.
# RegExpes start with '/' and are required to match the entire url.
# Use '#' or ';' at the start of a line to ignore that line
# Changes will take effect at the next navigation to the corresponding urls.
# Examples:
#    *.mozilla.org
#    https://good.com/nice/path
#    /https\:\/\/(www\.)?blob\.(com|org|net).*

title: Stop Fingerprinting
